name: Wolf, Dire
description: The Dire Wolf is a large, formidable predator with a powerful bite and keen senses, making it an effective hunter.
memorable: Its Pack Tactics ability allows it to coordinate deadly attacks with allies.
goals: To hunt and prey on creatures within its territory.
relations: Often found in packs, hunting alongside other wolves.
environment: Typically inhabits forests and wilderness areas.
strengths: Good damage potential with high mobility and pack tactics.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma scores limit its problem-solving abilities.
attacks: Bite attack deals significant piercing damage with a chance to knock targets prone.
most_powerful_ability: Hungry Growl can frighten foes and set up advantageous attacks.
senses: Heightened hearing and smell enhance its perception to 18 when hunting.
skills: Stealthy creature with a high stealth score, allowing it to approach prey quietly.
additional_information: Packs often hunt in groups for strategic advantages.
Frightening growl can disrupt enemy strategies.
Natural camouflage aids in stealthy approaches.
Strong physical capabilities make it durable in combat.
Effective at ambushing prey due to high speed.
test_queries: large predatory wolf with pack tactics
wolf known for frightening growl ability
fast large beast with strong bite
